description.value:
Piety: You [[/gain 2 hr]]{gain 2 piety} the first time in an encounter that you or any ally within 10 squares gains temporary Stamina, or uses a triggered action to reduce incoming damage or to impose a bane or double bane on an enemyâ€™s power roll.

Prayer Effect: One ally within 10 squares gains [[/heal 4*@I type=temporary]]{temporary Stamina} equal to four times your Intuition score.
